pageTitle: Public events for November 23, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, November 23, 2015:

Ottawa

All events listed below taking place at:

Canadian Museum of Nature
240 McLeod Street
Ottawa, Ontario

3:00 p.m.

Media arrive at the Canadian Museum of Nature via Main Entrance, register within and proceed to the media centre located in the Museumâ€™s Rotunda.

3:15-3:45 p.m.

3:15 Ministers arrive via Main Entrance.

3:30 Premiers arrive via Group Entrance.

Note to media:

  • Photo opportunity only. Photographers are invited to wait outside the entrance, located on east side of the building.

3:40 p.m.

Prime Minister arrives via Group Entrance.

Note to media:

  • Photo opportunity only. Photographers are invited to wait outside the entrance, located on east side of the building.

3:46 p.m.

Official greeting photos begin in the Rotunda.

Note to media:

  • Photo opportunity only.

4:00-5:00 p.m.

Climate science briefing by scientists, and Google Hangout. The briefing will take place in the Barrick Salon.

Notes to media:

  • Pool cameras only in the Barrick Salon.
  • The briefing will be broadcast live on screens in the Rotunda room for media to watch.
  • The event will be broadcast live on the Web at: the.canwebcast.net/PM
  • A Google Hangout with Canadian secondary school students will take place during the presentation. The Google Hangout will also be available to watch on the Prime Minister's YouTube channel after the event.
  • The PowerPoint presentation used during the climate science briefing will be available at ec.gc.ca.

5:15-6:00 p.m.

Media Q&A with presenters in the Rotunda room.

Note to media:

  • Following the presentation, the presenters will be available for a background Q&A session for media in the Rotunda room.

8:57 p.m.

Group photo with Prime Minister and Premiers in the Rotunda room.

Note to media:

  • Photo opportunity only.

9:00-9:30 p.m.

Press Conference.

Note to media:

  • Photo opportunity and media Q&A.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
